nl.weeaboo.vn.image

Interface IWritableScreenshot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAsyncRenderTask, IScreenshot, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IWritableScreenshot
extends IScreenshot

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Sets the pixel data for this screenshot.

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.weeaboo.vn.image.IScreenshot

    • Method Detail

      • setPixels

        void setPixels(ITextureData texData,
               nl.weeaboo.common.Dim screenSize)
        Sets the pixel data for this screenshot.
        Parameters:
        texData - Pixel data.
        screenSize - The screen resolution at the time that this screenshot was taken. This is necessary in order to support changing screen resolutions. If we store the screen resolution with the pixel data, we can maintain the relative size of the texture compared to the screen.
